subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2020-21 at current prices?
question_hi: 2020-21 में भारत का ग्रॉस अंडिया (GDP) क्या था?
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2020-21 was around Rs. 239.59 trillion (in روبية الهند).
explanation_hi: India's GDP in 2020-21 was approximately Rs. 239.59 trillion (in روبية الهند).
explanation_ar: بلغ الناتج المحلي الإجمالي (GDP) للهند في الفترة من 2020-21 حوالي Rs. 239,590,000,000,000 (بعملة الروبية الهندية).
